SELECT ? AS one FROM "statuses" WHERE "statuses"."deleted_at" IS ? AND "statuses"."reblog_of_id" = $? AND "statuses"."account_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT "statuses".* FROM "statuses" WHERE "statuses"."deleted_at" IS ? AND "statuses"."account_id" = $? ORDER BY "statuses"."id" DESC LIMIT $?
SELECT "statuses".* FROM "statuses" WHERE "statuses"."deleted_at" IS ? AND "statuses"."id" = $? ORDER BY "statuses"."id" DESC LIMIT $?
